content.new:
# Prerequisites

\* \[ \] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following: \* Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: [http://answers.gazebosim.org](http://answers.gazebosim.org)

\* Checked that your issue isn't already filed.

\* Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs # Description

I have only checked the second point, since I believe 3 is not true and 1 will not be informative.

# Description

sdformat-6 is failing to compile for me. I am trying to install gazebo-10 and it requires version 6 of sdformat. Here is the error I receive:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
<internal:gem_prelude>:4:in `<internal:gem_prelude>': undefined method `gem' for main:Object (NoMethodError)
    1: from <internal:gem_prelude>:3:in `<internal:gem_prelude>'
<internal:gem_prelude>:6:in `rescue in <internal:gem_prelude>': uninitialized constant Gem::LoadError (NameError)
make[2]: *** [sdf/1.6/CMakeFiles/schema1_6.dir/build.make:115: sdf/1.6/actor.xsd] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1996: sdf/1.6/CMakeFiles/schema1_6.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:141: all] Error 2
```

# Steps to Reproduce

1. Clone the latest sdformat version 6. [d4d9796](#!/osrf/sdformat/commits/d4d9796600b9) or get the relevant download from the 6.2 tag.
2. Run the build process as shown \[here\]\([http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install\_dependencies\_from\_source&cat=install](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_dependencies_from_source&cat=install)\)

**Expected behavior:**

The build should complete successfully.

**Actual behavior:**

The build fails with the following error.

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
<internal:gem_prelude>:4:in `<internal:gem_prelude>': undefined method `gem' for main:Object (NoMethodError)
    1: from <internal:gem_prelude>:3:in `<internal:gem_prelude>'
<internal:gem_prelude>:6:in `rescue in <internal:gem_prelude>': uninitialized constant Gem::LoadError (NameError)
make[2]: *** [sdf/1.6/CMakeFiles/schema1_6.dir/build.make:115: sdf/1.6/actor.xsd] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1996: sdf/1.6/CMakeFiles/schema1_6.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:141: all] Error 2
```

‌

**Reproduces how often:**

Every time I try to build sdformat-6.

# Versions

OS: ArchLinux

cmake: v3.15.5

gcc: v9.2.0

sdformat: v6.2

ruby: v2.6.5 \(this seems like a likely culprit to me since gem stuff is related to ruby and Ubuntu 18.04 offers ruby 2.5.1 which presumably works\)

I do not think the versions of the other dependencies are useful to this issue.

\# Additional Information

N/A
